meta.title: Gorgons Legend
meta.description: A mix of platformer with fast paced arcade action, take on the role of three different characters... all part of the same story.

content.name: Adventures
content.description: As the game unfolders, you can play up to a total of 3 different characters, each with their own unique abilities and story.

content.name: Fast Paced
content.description: a mix of platformer with fast paced arcade action

content.name: Custom Builds
content.description: Customize and build each character with different attributes and abilities

meta.title: Jaek's Adven'cha
meta.description: Jaek dreams of becoming a great adventurer, but he's not quite there yet. Help him on his journey to become the greatest adventurer of all time!

content.name: Challenge
content.description: Every level comes with a challenge... and a boss.  Are you up for the journey?

content.name: Flappy Style
content.description: Enjoy the classic flappy bird style gameplay, but with a twist!

content.name: Powerups
content.description: Collect powerups to use them strategically to your advantage.

meta.title: Isle of Zultiki
meta.description: Different people all over the world are drawn to a mysterious island. What is the island's secret?

content.name: Professions
content.description: Enjoy up to 12 different professions to choose from.  Each class has their own unique abilities and playstyle.

content.name: Spells
content.description: Uncover new spells and abilities as you level up.  Use them strategically to your advantage.

content.name: Customize
content.description: Build on your character's attributes and abilities to make them your own.

meta.title: Palooza
meta.description: Play an engaging Match 3 game with a twist. Collect powerups and use them strategically to your advantage.

content.name: Puzzling Combos
content.description: Faxanadu, Guild Wars 1, Quest for Glory

content.name: Legendary Specials
content.description: She-Ra: Princess of Power, Legend of Korra, Owl House

meta.title: Spin2Win
meta.description: Experience the mysterious slot machine.  Myths have been told where travelers have received a gift from this weird machine.

content.name: Line up!
content.description: Line up the reels of different types of symbols.

content.name: Limited spins
content.description: You only receive a limited amount of spins.  Use them wisely.

content.name: Prizes
content.description: There is a chance to win a prize when you line up the right symbols.  Prizes contantly change.
